description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Virtual Hard Disk (VHDX) denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-38264):

1. Identify the appropriate KB article based on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2, install KB5046617.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, install KB5046633.
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2, also install KB5046633.

2. Download the updates from the official Microsoft Update Catalog using the following links:
   - [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
   - [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)

3. Restart your system after the updates are applied to ensure all changes are effective.

**Details**:
- This issue has been classified with a maximum severity of 'important'. Addressing it can help prevent unauthorized access and potential service disruptions.
- Ensure that your system is configured to receive updates automatically for the best protection.
